title: Set global app background to bright_red via theme tokens

requirements.summary: Update global OKLCH CSS theme tokens so bg-background renders bright_red in both :root and .dark while preserving readable foreground and surface contrast.
acceptanceCriteria: In light mode, the page background (from `bg-background`) appears bright red rather than the current bright yellow.
In dark mode (when `.dark` class is applied), the page background (from `bg-background`) also appears bright red.
Foreground text and primary surfaces (e.g., cards/popovers) remain readable against the bright red background without requiring per-component overrides.

file_operations.description: Adjust the OKLCH CSS variables in :root and .dark to make --background a bright red, and tune dependent tokens (at minimum --foreground, --card/--card-foreground, --popover/--popover-foreground, plus any needed border/muted/secondary tokens) so text and surfaces remain readable on the new red background while keeping body styled via @apply bg-background text-foreground.
